description: An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for extra strength aspirin.  The active ingredient is apparently hallucinogenic, which is certainly one way to stop from feeling pain.

An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for a pill to cure minor illnesses.  You're not looking forward to getting that royal jelly now that you've seen what the bees are like lately.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for some kind of energy drink.  You do a double-take when you see just how much caffeine and alcohol you're supposed to add to the recipe.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an insecticide.  "WEAR MASK DURING BREWING!!!!!" is written at the bottom of the recipe
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an extremely powerful hallucinogen.  The end product will supposedly allow you to "see through time".

An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for a "stamina enhancement".  The ingredients make you raise your eyebrows, but the notes in the margins indicate that you won't need to sleep for quite some time after taking them.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an enchanted amulet.  The notes indicate wearing it should protect you from cold temperatures.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for a powder to "reveal that which is unseen".  There are repeated references testing its effects at dusk, at crossroads, and on Halloween.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for…a musical instrument?  You didn't realize that alchemy could be used to get the band back together again.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an enchanted amulet.  The notes have several parallel tears in them near the bottom.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an enchanted amulet.  The notes have "take off before meals!!" underlined at the bottom.

An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an enchanted amulet.  The writing gets increasingly shaky, dissolving into a series of ink blots just under the final steps of the recipe.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an enchanted amulet.  The notes indicate that it will cause you to grow bark and to "take off your boots first".
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an enchanted amulet.  There are several stick-figure drawings of a person with a scorpion's tail in the margins.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an enchanted amulet.  The notes indicate that you "still can't fly" even with it on.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an enchanted amulet.  The notes repeatedly mention "Webs aren't really big enough to test, thank God."
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for creating cold iron.  You note with amusement that the recipe doesn't seem to require any actual iron.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for the elixir of life.  If only you had found this before the world ended.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for a potion to increase your strength.  Written at the bottom is the note, "Be very careful after drinking!".

name.str_sp: scribbled notes (potion of wicked quick hands)

description: An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for a potion to increase your dexterity.  It looks like the undead will be catching these hands.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for a potion to allow you to leap a great distance.  Hopefully it also allows you land safely after those great leaps.

An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for a mystical trap that will allow you imprison beings from "the Outside."  Based on some scribbled sketches of things it's supposed to contain, you hope it holds if you try to use it.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for a method to obtain the power of nature.  The ingredients list tells you that nature is definitely not going to appreciate that.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for a method to obtain the power of…humanity?  More human than human, you suppose.
